column4: Hi all, I have filezilla in ubuntu 12.04, but it does not work, is unable to connect to any server
So whats the error message then - here, filezilla works perfectly.
thi is the error:
An you are specifying an FTP server?
yes, but do not connect to any server
Do you have an example server?
but are private!
Maybe ther do not run on the standard ports.
Before, it connected well to these servers
The problem appeared yesterday. Began to cease to connect yesterday
Did you ensure you are using the correct ports?
yes
If I try it with Windows, it works perfectly with the same data connection.
Do you even have a working networking connection using Ubuntu?
yes
You know that it is?
I know what?
my problem with Filezilla
I have no further idea, since filezilla is working fine here, and we've stepped through the obvious misconfigurations.
i tried with other ftp client with the same configuration, and it works perfectly
You could create a bug report then.
where?
